titles.title: Small Business Growth and Investment Act of 2014
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to adjust the limits on expensing of certain depreciable business assets.
Small Business Growth and Investment Act of 2014

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Small Business Growth and Investment Act of 2014 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase: (1) the expensing allowance for depreciable business property to $250,000 for taxable years beginning after 2013, and (2) the threshold level for such property over which the expensing allowance is reduced to $800,000.
